title: Corporate Governance Practices of CD Projekt SA

content.text: CD Projekt SA employs a diverse and independent board of directors. The board is composed of both executive and non-executive directors, with a majority of independent directors ensuring impartial decision-making. This composition ensures a balance of expertise and avoids excessive concentration of power.

CD Projekt SA follows a transparent and performance-based executive compensation structure. The company has a remuneration committee responsible for designing executive compensation plans that align with corporate goals and shareholder interests. The compensation structure includes a combination of fixed salary, performance bonuses, and long-term incentives tied to the company's financial performance.
